entries.name: Elara, Tyro of The Third Chamber

levels.benefit: You gain +1 on your starting game roll.
Models in Garryth's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment.

availableModels.models: Retribution non-character warjacks
Mage Hunter units
Mage Hunter Assassin solos, Nayl

levels.benefit: Warrior models/units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Roll two dice for your starting game roll and keep the higher result.

availableModels.models: Retribution non-character myrmidons with Field Generator systems
Dawnguard Invictors, Dawnguard Sentinels, Houseguard units
Arcanists, Dawnguard Scyirs, Houseguard solos, Sylys Wyshnalyrr the Seeker

levels.benefit: Arcanists gain Force Multiplier (â˜…Action). (Replace the Arcanist card with the theme force Arcanist card found in this article.)
Enemy models cannot run or charge during the first round of the game.

availableModels.models: Retribution non-character myrmidons with force field damage boxes
House Shyeel units
Arcanists, House Shyeel solos
Arcantrik Force Generator

levels.benefit: You can redeploy any one Mage Hunter model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Your deployment is extended 2" forward.

availableModels.models: Retribution non-character warjacks
Mage Hunter units
Arcanist solos, Ghost Sniper solos, Mage Hunter solos

levels.benefit: You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.

For each Arcanist solo in the army, one myrmidon in Ossyan's battlegroup gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Ossyan's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Ossyan does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

availableModels.models: Retribution non-character myrmidons without force field damage boxes, Hypnos
Stormfall Archers, Houseguard units, House Vyre units
Arcanist, Ghost Sniper, Sylys Wyshnalyrr
Arcantrik Force Generator

tiers.name: Rahn - Charge of the Battle Mages

levels.benefit: House Shyeel Battle Mage units and House Shyeel Battle Mage Magister solos in the army gain Advance Move. Models with Advance Move can make a full advance after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Rahn's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Rahn does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

availableModels.models: Retribution non-character warjacks
Houseguard units, House Shyeel Battle Mage Units
Arcanist solos, House Shyeel Battle Mage Magister solos

levels.benefit: Heavy warjacks and colossals gain +2SPD during your first turn of the game.
Stormfall Archers gain Advance Deployment.

availableModels.models: Non-character Retribution warjacks with Field Dependent, Discordia
House Shyeel units, Houseguard units, Stormfall Archers
Arcanist Solos, House Shyeel solos, Eiryss, Angel of Retribution, Sylys Wyshnalyrr, the Seeker.

tiers.name: Ravyn - Will of the Nine Voices

levels.benefit: You gain +1 on your starting game roll.
Each warjack in Ravyn's battlegroup is automatically allocated 1 focus point at the start of your first Control Phase. This focus is in addition to any points Ravyn allocates.

availableModels.models: Retribution non-character warjacks
Dawnguard Invictor units, Mage Hunter units, Stormfall Archer units
Mage Hunter solos, Fane Knight Skyreth Issyen

levels.benefit: Solos gain Advance Deployyment.
You gain +1 on starting roll
Models/units in your army can begin the game affected by Thyron's upkeep spells. Thyron does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

Houseguard units, Mage Hunter Infiltrators, Stormfall Archers
Arcanists, Ghost Snipers, Houseguard solos, Soulless solos, Narn Mage Hunter of Ios, Sylys Wyshnalyrr the Seeker

levels.benefit: For every two units in the army, one heavy warjack in Vyros’ battlegroup gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.).
Each warjack in Vyros’ battlegroup is automatically allocated 1 focus point at the start of your first Control Phase. This focus is in addition to any points Vyros allocates.
